title: 9-year-old injured when bullets were fired at vehicle in east Oak Cliff
content:
A 9-year-old was injured Sunday evening when bullets sprayed the vehicle the child was in, police said.
Dallas police responded about 7:20 p.m. to Ramona Avenue and East Ledbetter Drive, near Glendale Park in east Oak Cliff.
Multiple shots were fired at the vehicle, according to preliminary information.
The child was transported in good condition to Children's Medical Center Dallas, police said.
